mapper.insert: insert into personal_merit_record (p_id, d_name, m_id, p_title, p_date, p_file, p_m_id, p_contexts) values (#{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pContexts,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update personal_merit_record set d_name = #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_title = #{pTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_date = #{pDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, p_file = #{pFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_m_id = #{pMId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_contexts = #{pContexts,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p_id, d_name, m_id, p_title, p_date, p_file, p_m_id, p_contexts from personal_merit_record
